Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 4 or later.

Traits.Name: Flying
Traits.Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Actions.Name: Geyser
Actions.Effect: Summon a pit in a free space in the area.

Actions.Name: Summon Storm
Actions.Description: Summon a blast 1 terrain effect in range 8. While inside, characters are vulnerable and blinded. This terrain effect lasts until this ability is used again or the storm caller is defeated.
